pageContext.analysis: Trump is trying to distance himself from Prince Andrew because of his association with convicted sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein. But Trump told People magazine in 2000 that Prince Andrew is “not pretentious. He’s a lot of fun to be with,." The article also states that Trump and Andrew, as well as Trump’s then-girlfriend Melania Knauss, had “chatted” at a Halloween costume party hosted by Heidi Klum in New York City in 2000.
